description: Detects a suspicious copy command to or from an Admin share or remote
author: Florian Roth
oscd.community
Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT
Zach Stanford @svch0st
Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Copy from Admin Share
query: ((process.command_line.text:*\\\\* AND process.command_line.text:*$*) AND ((((((process.executable.text:(*\\robocopy.exe OR *\\xcopy.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("robocopy.exe" OR "XCOPY.EXE")))) OR ((((process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe")) AND process.command_line.text:*copy*)))) OR ((((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe* OR *\\pwsh.exe*)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND process.command_line.text:(*copy\-item* OR *copy* OR *cpi\ * OR *\ cp\ * OR *move* OR *move\-item* OR *\ mi\ * OR *\ mv\ *)))))
